Welcome to the official myYaKuZa Portal. One of the most famous XIII clans converted in a XIII media platform, based in particular on the video industry. Have fun visiting @http://myYKZA.free.fr...!


 This Is The End
Posted by w0Lfi on Saturday December 13 2008 @ 22:13

This is the end, Beautiful friend.

Listening to "The Doors", thinking about this news, getting my mind confused... Well, it has to be said, after almost 2 intense years of existence and 2 months of half inactivity, myYKZA is about to retire.

I, we, have fulfiled ours "XIII objectives" with success and it's time, especially for me, to move on to the next step. Which one? Still unclear and yes, we're not in 2009 yet. So, let's stay in the present!


This news allows me to thank you.
You, myCrew,
You, myYKZA partners,
You, myYKZA users,
You, who is reading.

At last, no worries, the myYKZA media platform will remain online. Therefore, if one day you feel nostalgic or if you need something : do not lose sight of the fact that "end" doesn't mean "destruction" nor "oblivion".
With honor & humanity : take care everyone!



Best, best & best regards...!
[ Comments (16)   ]

 'The XIII Frag Collector'
Posted by Blizzard on Thursday December 04 2008 @ 15:12

Bonjour, mes amis!
It's time for another news, concerning our dear frEaKy! He's yet bringing out his 3rd video, as we hope he will continue releasing more. It's time to present you another style of video, a kind of summary video. This video contains some of the old times in XIII.

This video, called the "XIII Frags Collection" may not seem a very stunning title, but it does tell the tale. This video presents several recordings from various players. Including international powers from throughout whole Europe! All amazing kills from the videos of these creators have been put to form the masterpiece of an international video.


frEaKy - XIII Frags Collection : Here.

Personally, I liked the font and also the fact that this video shows that the community can and will be one heart, body and spirit. Also there's no room for unnecessary effects or texts, so did frEaKy as well thought. Let's hope he will bring out a sequel with more and new different players.

C'est tout!
[ Comments (3)   ]

 Lost XIII by frEaKy & Chr1s2
Posted by w0Lfi on Tuesday November 18 2008 @ 19:20

Hiii,
Will the myYKZA movie database stop growing one day? Probably. One day... But not tonight! I'm glad to introduce you a brand new XIII video made by frEaKy and Chr1s2. Thank you men for sharing it here.

To be honest, I'm still downloading this video, but it would have been selfish not to present it to you, right now. Truly, we can expect a high level work, from our 2 protagonists. Will we be impressed? Will we be amazed? One way to answer to these questions... Downloading and watching this movie!


frEaKy & Chr1s2 - Lost XIII : Here.

PS : frEaKy? Chr1s2? For the title... Will we get the explanation by watching the video or must you help us to get the right meaning of it?
Grrr... Kind regards...
[ Comments (11)   ]

 XIII Connection© by w0Lfi
Posted by w0Lfi on Saturday November 15 2008 @ 20:30

Hello,
2 hours ago, Adobe Photoshop was launched on my PC. At this time, a lonely but not forgotten *Beta* video was calmy waiting in a folder. Maybe one day, this one could be released... It would have been a bit "idiot" if I wouldn't have showed it to you. Today, I dare...!

This video is above all, a concept : introducing several players, several actions and several maps in one video. A "clan-video"? Almost, but not totally. A concept which is always successful in famous games, like for example in Counter-Strike. With "Planet XIII", Id tried. But he has never achieved his project. Anyway, it inspired me and I also tried my luck. If you're interested, just test / taste it!


w0Lfi - XIII Connection *Beta*© : Here.

I'd like to thank, in order of appearance, Blizzard, musiK, VisTa,
Destroyer, PAE and HellFire who took part in this quite "unofficial" project by sending me their frags. This video is yours as well.
Greetings! :]
[ Comments (4)   ]
